HDLC

What does it do?

The HDLC module provides bit stuffing, destuffing, framing and deframing, according to the HDLC protocol. It also provides 16 and 32 bit CRC generation and checking services for HDLC frames.

HDLC may not be a DSP function, but is needed to accompany several DSP components.

How does it work?
